title: could i get some help with picking a good pc for streaming?
body:
ok this might not be the best place to ask this but i searched everywhere i couldnt find anything so i was wondering if this pc is good for streaming league on high-medium? 
 • CPU:Intel Core i3-4170 3.7GHz 3MB cache 
 • Internal memory: 8GB DDRAM III 1600MHz 
 • Hard Drive 1TB SATA,7200rpm/min 
 • nVidia GeForce GT 730(2GB) 
 • DVD-RW 
 • Keyboard 
 • USB 
 • Free DOS

replies.body: I don't really have any personal recommendations to offer here, but I do suggest using our [recommended specs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements)guide as a supplement.  Hopefully, it can help towards make a decision best fit for you.  Good luck!
